column2: Ted Cruz Slapped Down After Joking About 'Awesome' Cancun Vacation
column5: Sen. Ted Cruz (R-TX) faced a scolding online on Tuesday after he joked about "awesome" Cancun vacations. Earlier this year Cruz fled to Cancun as Texas was facing massive power outages due to a winter storm. The senator was defiant about the vacation as he shared a tweet promoting "awesome" trips to Cancun on Tuesday.
